Class SparseDoubleVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.commons.math.SparseDoubleVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DoubleVector

    public class SparseDoubleVector
extends Object
implements DoubleVector
    The implementation of SparseVector.

      • sliceUnsafe

        public DoubleVector sliceUnsafe(int start,
                       int end)
        Description copied from interface: DoubleVector
        Slices this vector from start to end, both are INCLUSIVE. For example vec = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5], vec.slice(2, 5) = [2, 3, 4, 5].
        Specified by:
        sliceUnsafe in interface DoubleVector
        Parameters:
        start - inclusive
        end - inclusive
        Returns:
        a new vector that is only (length) long.
